markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=695) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 224 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=5)

**Prerequisites**
[Cleric Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=694)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). You can prepare your deity’s spells in your spell slots of the appropriate level from the cleric archetype.

<title level="2">Basic Cleric Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Divine Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=698), [Expert Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=699)
name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
